mapper.sql: select p.id, p.user_id, u.user_name, p.server_id, s.name_tag as server_name, p.permission_type, p.can_execute_cmd, p.can_view_log, p.can_manage, p.cmd_whitelist, p.cmd_blacklist, p.expire_time, p.status, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark from sys_user_rcon_server p left join sys_user u on p.user_id = u.user_id left join server_info s on p.server_id = s.id
mapper.select: select distinct server_id from sys_user_rcon_server where user_id = #{userId} and status = '0' and (expire_time is null or expire_time > now())

select count(*) from sys_user_rcon_server where user_id = #{userId} and server_id = #{serverId} and status = '0' and (expire_time is null or expire_time > now()) and ( (#{permission} = 'view' and can_view_log = 1) or (#{permission} = 'command' and can_execute_cmd = 1) or (#{permission} = 'manage' and can_manage = 1) or (#{permission} = 'admin' and permission_type = 'admin') )
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user_rcon_server where id in #{id}
